name: Virtual Art Gallery
description: Desktop based application for emerging artists to showcase there Artworks

name: Travel and Tourism
description: A desktop based application for hotel booking

name: Payment Gateway
description: A payment gateway system with animations by using credit card

name: Glassmorphic Calculator/Converter
description: A BASIC CALCULATOR AND CURRENCY CONVERTER WITH A GLASS BODY TRANSLUCENT TYPE DESIGN

name: Flip Card Game
description: Flip Card Game is a memory-style game that challenges players to match pairs of cards with a fun and interactive user interface. The game is built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript and is suitable for both desktop and mobile devices.

name: LANtern Messenger
description: LANtern Messenger is a peer-to-peer messaging application that enables direct, serverless communication over local networks. Built with React, Vite, PeerJS, and Tailwind CSS, it supports real-time text messaging, file sharing, and robust reconnection logic.

name: iTODO-TASK MANAGER
description: Welcome to iTask, a simple yet powerful todo list application built with React. Keep track of your tasks, set priorities, and manage your productivity in an intuitive and user-friendly interface.
